channel.title: Server works on 1 computer but not other!
channel.description: :mad: i have made a server about 2 weeks ago called B15.servebeer.com and i works great but i need to put my server onto my other computer. the computer that it works on is a vista. the one i want to connect it to is my xp for a while. soo what i did was a transferred whole server + client other to my other computer (xp) and when i run server it says online but no one can log in. i have no-ip running it says host does not need update! also i have latest JDK1.0_16 and JRE. what else do i need to do! :(

item.title: Server works on 1 computer but not other!

@fatwallet wrote:

I’ll look it up tomorrow, sounds good. Good luck!

omgosh tysooooooo much it was that simple ty ty ty ty ty would u like to join b15.servebeer.com go to www.b15servebeer.webs.com to get client.

item.title: Server works on 1 computer but not other!
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

If your other computer is on the same network, you must go into your router and change the local ip address to that of the current computer’s

Read full topic
